recommended_charts: Bar chart of papers per conference
Conference.data_quality_score: High - No missing data, consistent values
Conference.selection_rationale: Perfect categorical variable for grouping and comparison analysis

Year.visualization_suitability: Excellent - Natural time ordering, reasonable range
recommended_charts: Line chart of publications over time
Year.data_quality_score: High - All values are valid 4-digit years
Year.selection_rationale: Essential for temporal analysis and trend visualization

recommended_charts: Pie chart of paper type distribution
PaperType.data_quality_score: High - No missing data, consistent values
PaperType.selection_rationale: Provides insight into the distribution of paper types

TotalCitations.visualization_suitability: High - Better representation of paper impact than individual sources
recommended_charts: Box plot of citations by conference
TotalCitations.data_quality_score: Good - Can handle missing values by treating as 0
TotalCitations.selection_rationale: Combines citation counts for a comprehensive impact metric

Downloads_Xplore_Binned.visualization_suitability: High - Popularity distribution charts, popularity by content type
Downloads_Xplore_Binned.selection_rationale: Enables comparison of content reach through intuitive popularity tiers

AuthorCountry.visualization_suitability: Excellent - Enables geographic analysis of research distribution
AuthorCountry.data_quality_score: Good - 85% extraction success rate with 'Other' fallback
AuthorCountry.selection_rationale: Unlocks geographic insights from unstructured affiliation text
